query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Communication Toolkit
result.description: A communication toolkit that will be made available to all partners in high definition formats, with English content and ready for adaptation and printing, for supporting the communication and dissemination activities that will be performed during the project. The toolkit includes a leaflet, a poster and banners and a general brochure.

result.title: SEP financial assessment Tool
result.description: Computer-based tool (English and Spanish versions) which will provide a preliminary assistance on technical and financial issues to those registered members who were interested in investing or promoting any kind of SEP. The Tool will require a number of data of the project to be assessed, which will have to be introduced by the user. Afterwards, the Tool will provide the basic output information in technical and financial issues, by means of common calculations in sustainable energy field as well as usual recommendations based on the data collected throughout the project. The assessment Tool will accomplish the next characteristics: user-friendly interface, reliable, accurate, realistic and updated.

result.title: Policy recommendations based on consultation forum involving participants and relevant stakeholders and outcome of mixed-methods study exploring
result.description: Publication of policy recommendations, based on consultation forum involving participants and relevant stakeholders and outcome of mixed-methods study exploring: options to make pension systems (more) sustainable into the future; policies designed to extend working life; and willingness to pay through (increased) taxation to support pensions.

result.title: Residential heating solid biofuels market Roadmaps
result.description: a Roadmap identifying measures/actions to be implemented in order to develop the sustainable solid biofuels market of the most relevant residential heating biofuels in each of the Mediterranean countries participating in the project consortium will be developed. An integrated Roadmap for all the countries will also be carried out.

result.title: Summary report on monitoring results for test sites (final)
result.description:
Interim report on the establishment of test sites
• Final report on monitoring results for test sites in Greece for the 2nd growing season (DAMT, DUTH, M35) • Final report on monitoring results for test sites in Ukraine (1) for the 2nd growing season (SALIX, M35) • Final report on monitoring results for test sites in Ukraine (2) for the 2nd growing season (IBC&SB, M35) • Final report on monitoring results for test sites in Germany for the 2nd growing season (BTU CS, M35)
